text: The only thing worse than Howard Stern are the people who call in to talk to Howard Stern.

name: tinhand
text: A comment left by tinhand was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by wildcat, headphones, fancypants, AmonRunsAmok)

name: apocowarg
text: I think that little console in front of Pat has a video monitor on it. Maybe there's an external mounted camera.

name: zapatos
text: an external mounted camera? This Ray we're speaking of, I am sure he has many.

name: jodequa
text: why does it hurt

name: atmus
text:
Most people don't realise that "Pride" is infact a tangible thing. It is actually something you have deep inside of you that grows like hair, or toenails. The reason that it hurts is because a dog crapping on your face like that is the final event in a long line of pride-cutting actions, and it 'cuts the nail' too close-so to speak-that it hits a nerve cluster.

Either that, or the dog had explosive diahrea into the guys eyes which is only slightly less fatal than boiling gravy.

name: apocowarg
text: That's a High-To-Low Comedy Chubby I just gave you.

text: Chubbied for apt chubby classification.

text: Have a chubby for the term "chubby classification".

name: dangelder
text: You all get chubbies from me but I'll be damned if I'm going to explain myself.

text:
ray's boat appears to have a phone where your average armoured boat (AVERAGE ARMOURED BOAT) would have its driving junk.

to inform cats as to the speed at which he is currently cruising? or something more.. rad? i lay no claims to ray's mind

name: deusoma
text:
"But Jesus said, Suffer little children, and forbid them not, to come unto Me: for of such is the Kingdom of Heaven."
(Matthew 19:14)

Not that I memorized the Bible or anything, I just vaguely remembered "suffer the children" and Googled it.

text: This is the second strip today I've rated higher due to the comments.
